statements: DELETE FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE agreement_id = 123 AND licensee_name = 'ABC Music';

DELETE FROM music_tracks WHERE genre = 'Pop' AND length_minutes > 3;

DELETE FROM agreement_parties WHERE agreement_id = 100 AND party_id = 200;
